name: Pole Sport
description: Pole sport is a fun and challenging activity that combines dance, acrobatics, and strength training. It helps improve flexibility, coordination, and core strength while boosting confidence and creativity.

services.name: Swimming
services.description: Swimming is a recreational and competitive activity offered at the university pool. It helps improve fitness, strength, and endurance while providing a great way to relax.

services.name: Bodybuilding
services.description: The university gym offers bodybuilding programs for students, helping them build muscle and improve physical health through weightlifting and structured training.

services.name: Yoga
services.description: Yoga sessions are available at the campus wellness center to help students reduce stress, enhance flexibility, and promote mental well-being.

services.name: Spinning
services.description: The university gym offers spinning classes, a high-intensity workout using stationary bikes, to improve cardiovascular fitness and burn calories.

services.name: CrossFit
services.description: CrossFit sessions are available to help students enhance strength, endurance, and overall fitness through a mix of weightlifting, cardio, and bodyweight exercises.

services.name: Body Building 2
services.description: The university gym offers bodybuilding programs for students, helping them build muscle and improve physical health through weightlifting and structured training.

services.name: Football F1
services.description: The university gym offers bodybuilding programs for students, helping them build muscle and improve physical health through weightlifting and structured training.

name: Health Center
description: The university health center provides medical services, counseling, and wellness programs to support students' physical and mental health needs.

services.name: Psychological Counseling
services.description: The university provides free counseling services to support students' mental health and emotional well-being through one-on-one sessions with trained psychologists.

services.name: Health Checkups
services.description: Basic health checkups and consultations are available at the campus health center to ensure students stay healthy and receive proper medical guidance.

name: Beauty Lab
description: The Beauty Lab offers a range of beauty and grooming services to help students look and feel their best, including haircuts, styling, facials, and nail care.

services.name: Women's Haircuts
services.description: Professional hairstylists for women are available at the Beauty Lab to provide haircuts, styling, and treatments to enhance students' appearance.

services.name: Men's Haircuts
services.description: The Beauty Lab offers haircuts, styling, and grooming services for men to help students maintain a polished and professional look.

name: Start Gate
description: The Start Gate is a hub for student entrepreneurs and innovators to develop their ideas, receive mentorship, and access resources to launch successful ventures.

name: Student Center
description: The Student Center is a space for students to study, relax, and participate in various activities, fostering a sense of community on campus.

name: Library
description: The university library offers a wide range of resources, including books, digital materials, and research assistance, to support academic success.

services.name: Study Rooms
services.description: The library offers private study rooms for students to work on assignments, projects, and research in a quiet and focused environment.

services.name: Research Assistance
services.description: Librarians provide research assistance to help students find relevant resources, navigate databases, and improve their academic writing skills.
